name: pnp-remove-non-team-members-from-list
title: Remove users from a SharePoint list who are no longer members of a Teams Team
shortDescription: This script is to remove users from a SharePoint list who are no longer members of a Teams Team.
longDescription: This script compares a list of members of a team with a list of people in a SharePoint list and removes anyone who is no longer a team member.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
